sections.title: Kubernetes Business Continuity

sections.title: Kubernetes Backup & Data Protection
sections.description: Avoid data corruption, loss, and downtime through a reliable, policy-driven backup and restore framework. We help you safeguard your workloads using proven Kubernetes backup practices.
offerings: Design and implement resilient, automated backup strategies aligned with your SLAs.
Enable full cluster and application-level data protection with scheduled and incremental backups.
Assess and optimize your backup strategy for maximum data integrity and operational confidence.

sections.title: Kubernetes Disaster Recovery
sections.description: Minimize downtime and accelerate recovery from unplanned incidents with customized disaster recovery planning for Kubernetes workloads.
offerings: Establish fast and automated disaster recovery workflows for critical business applications.
Implement multi-region or hybrid recovery architectures with zero data loss objectives.
Automate recovery and validation processes to ensure resilience and compliance.

sections.title: Kubernetes Migration
sections.description: Simplify migration of Kubernetes clusters, applications, and workloads across versions or environments—cloud to on-prem, or vice versa.
offerings: Seamlessly migrate workloads and persistent data without downtime or data inconsistency.
Ensure compatibility and security while moving clusters between environments or Kubernetes versions.
